mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ADDRESS ( ALL_REGIN_PUBLIC_COMPANY, OLD_ZIPCODE, ZIPCODE, PREFECTURE_NAME_KANA, MUNICIPALITY_NAME_KANA, TOWN_NAME_KANA, PREFECTURE_NAME, MUNICIPALITY_NAME, TOWN_NAME ) VALUES ( #{allRegionPublicCompanyCode}, #{oldZipCode}, #{zipCode}, #{prefectureNameKana}, #{municipalityNameKana}, #{townNameKana}, #{prefectureName}, #{municipalityName}, #{townName} )
